==Step 1. Get started==

Start using a passive vulnerability scanner during regular testing
Start tracking security bugs explicitly as such 
Turn source control repository access controls on
Check off AppSec STIG requirements
  * APP4010 Access rights to the CM repository not reviewed
  * APP5010 No tester designated to test for security flaws
  * APP5090 Flaws found during a code review are not tracked
